util

Class Oscillator

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.Oscillator

  • public class Oscillator
extends java.lang.Object
    An object that has specific waveforms associated with it that can be called to receive a value based on time. The oscillator is centred around zero and can be phase shited in radians and offset in the output, as well symmetrically clipped before offset.
    Author:
    Marco

      • getAmpClamp

        public float getAmpClamp()
        Get the value that the oscillator will be clamped at, both in the positive and negative region, before offset occurs. The allows for clipping of waveforms.
        Returns:
        The clamp value

      • setAmpClamp

        public void setAmpClamp(float ampclamp)
        Set the value that the oscillator will be clamped at, both in the positive and negative region, before offset occurs. The allows for clipping of waveforms.
        Parameters:
        ampclamp - The clamp value
